content: page 1 of 6 page 1 of 6 the southern hemisphere sky by arina shofiya level intermediate size one size finished measurements width 35 43 inches/90 cm length 68 9 inches/175 cm materials  approximately 929 6 yds/850m 2 99 oz/85 g of lace weight yarn yarn used in the sample silky mohair 1093 6 yds/1000m 3 53oz/100gr  us 6/4 mm circular needle  notions stitch markers tapestry needle gauge 18 stitches x 28 row = 4 inches/10 cm in stockinette swatch after blocking please thoroughly read the instructions before starting the project this pattern is intended for personal use only any copying distribution or publication is not allowed ©arina2021 page 2 of 6 garter tab cast on with scrap yarn cast on 3 stitches using provisional cast on method with project yarn knit 11 row of garter stitch rotate the resulting garter tab 90 degrees clockwise and pick up 5 stitches along the garter ridges remove the scrap yarn and knit the 3 live stitches you now have 11 stitches on the needles 3 garter edge stitches + 5 pattern stitches + 3 garter edge stitches set up row knit 3 place marker purl 5 place marker knit 3 the first and the last three stitches of every row are always knitted both on right side and on wrong side row to shape the garter edge chart instructions charts show only the right side row of the pattern they are read from right to left pay attention to the yellow stitches for the first repeat work those yellow stitches as k2tog on the wrong side purl the purled stitches and knit the knitted stitches work knit purl on double yarnover the red frame indicates pattern repeat if you consider placing markers between the chart repetition they will move in each row that starts with a yellow stitch the charts are laid out on the page in reverse order to give a better idea of how the last row of previous chart correlates with the first row of next chart work the pattern as follows  garter tab cast on  set up row  chart 1 work the stitches between the red frame 5 times  chart 2 work the stitches between the red frame 10 times  chart 3 work the stitches between the red frame 10 times  chart 4 work the stitches between the red frame 20 times  chart 5 work the stitches between the red frame 20 times  bind off slip 1 *knit 1 slip two stitches back to left hand needle knit those two stitces through the back loop repeat from * weave in the ends and pull tight to secure gently wash the shawl block into shape stitch key knit purl no stitch garter edge stitches k2tog knit two stitches together slip slip knit slip the first stitch as if to knit slip the second stitch as if to knit transfer them back to the left hand needle and knit
